caption:
In the photograph, three people are situated on a sandy beach setting up a windbreak. Two individuals stand holding opposite corners of a pink fabric, evidently struggling with the wind to keep it steady. The fabric is partially unfurled and fluttering. A third individual, a young child, is seated on the sand nearby, surrounded by several items that look like a cooler, a bag, and possibly other beach essentials.

The environment captures the essence of a sunny beach day, characterized by the sandy terrain and towering dune grass in the background. The dunes behind the individuals are covered with grass, indicating a natural beach habitat. The sky is strikingly clear and blue, suggesting good weather conditions.

The individuals are dressed in casual summer clothing, appropriate for a day at the beach. The scene captures a moment of active preparation and recreation, embodying a typical family or group outing at the beach.
title: Sunbathers at little sun river
